## Pre-Merge Cheat-Sheet:

### Stuff going into Develop:
* [ ] Dockerfile updated?
* [ ] Compose file updated?
* [ ] Changelog updated?
* [ ] README updated?
* [ ] Version number bumped appropriately?
* [ ] CI build passing?

### Stuff going in to Master:
* [ ] CI build passing?
* [ ] Tag pushed?
* [ ] Multi-arch Docker images built and pushed?
